p: Valacyclovir has also been approved for the treatment of HSV-1 and HSV-2 infections and clinical manifestations produced by HSV-1 and HSV-2, such as cold sores and recurrent genital herpes, as well as VZV and cytomegalovirus ( Ormrod et al., 2000). Furthermore, famciclovir is approved for treating herpes viruses, such as HSV-1 and HSV-2 (genital herpes and orolabial herpes), as well as VZV ( Simpson and Lyseng-Williamson, 2006).
